content.title: AQILA RIZA DZAHABI
quotes: Code is a journey, not a destination. Enjoy the process of creation and discovery.
In the source code of life, every decision is a commit that shapes our journey.
Every day is a new branch in the repository of life, make meaningful commits.

project.title: Luments Play
project.desc: This is a website that contains a movie list utilizing the TMDB API. The purpose of this website is to learn how to consume an API with Axios.
